SEARCH
Package ch.teko.game.model

Class Animate

java.lang.Object
ch.teko.game.model.Animate
public class Animate extends Object
The Animate class handles the animation of game assets. It keeps track of the current animation frame, and it can flip and rotate assets for rendering.

  • Constructor Summary

    Animate()
    Constructs a new Animate object with default values.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animate

      public Animate()
      Constructs a new Animate object with default values.

  • Method Details

    • onTick

      public boolean onTick()
      Updates the animation by progressing to the next frame if the timer has passed the frame rate threshold. If the animation reaches the last frame, it resets.
      Returns:
      true if the animation has reached the end of the sequence, false otherwise.

    • getAnimationIndex

      public int getAnimationIndex()
      Gets the current animation frame index.
      Returns:
      the current animation frame index.

    • getAnimationMaxIndex

      public int getAnimationMaxIndex()
      Gets the maximum index (number of frames) in the animation.
      Returns:
      the maximum index of the animation (number of frames).

    • getCurrentAsset

      public Asset getCurrentAsset()
      Gets the current asset being animated.
      Returns:
      the current Asset being animated.

    • isAnimationRunning

      public boolean isAnimationRunning(Asset asset)
      Checks if the animation for the given asset is already running.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to check.
      Returns:
      true if the animation for the given asset is running, false otherwise.

    • animate

      public void animate(Asset asset)
      Starts the animation for the given asset. If the animation is already running, it will not reset.
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset to animate.

    • get

      public BufferedImage get()
      Retrieves the current frame of the animation as a subimage from the sprite sheet, and applies flipping if necessary.
      Returns:
      the current frame of the animation as a BufferedImage.

    • copyImage

      public static BufferedImage copyImage(BufferedImage source)
      Creates a copy of the given BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      source - the source image to copy.
      Returns:
      a new BufferedImage that is a copy of the source image.

    • rotate

      public BufferedImage rotate(BufferedImage image)
      Rotates or flips the given BufferedImage if the flipAsset flag is set.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to rotate or flip.
      Returns:
      the rotated or flipped image.

    • flipAsset

      public static void flipAsset(BufferedImage image)
      Flips the given BufferedImage horizontally.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to flip horizontally.
